title: The global Vikings
itunes:title: The global Vikings
itunes:subtitle: Levi Roach describes how the Norse people travelled, raided and settled far beyond their Scandinavian homeland.
description:
Medieval historian Levi Roach describes how the Norse people travelled, raided and settled far beyond their Scandinavian homeland, even journeying across the Atlantic to America.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
